title: 有趣地图LV.4
author: 默默无闻的玩家
txt_content:

1:[bow][quiver]  弓箭套装


2:[iron_door][iron_door]    电动门
    [stone_pressureplate][stone_pressureplate]

3:[lever][redstone_wire1][stone][redstone_torch][repeater]  非门(没有灭的红石火把)

   [stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone][stone]
4:[wooden_door]      [workbench][furnace][chest]     [bed][stone]
